c74object.name: ta.copyfile
c74object.description: Javascript code to copy one file from one directory to another.

inlet.description: Select a source file and copy it to another directory, with a different file name if you wish tta.

method.name: from
method.description:
The message from preceeded with a directory and a file extension sets the source file to copy from. If no file extension is provided the default ".maxpat" is used.
Note: ta.copyfile can only work with files compatible with max file formats. See "max-fileformats.txt" for a list of all possible formats.

method.name: to
method.description:
The message to preceeded with a directory and a file extension sets the destination file from which to copy the source file tta. If no file extension is provided the default ".maxpat" is used.
Note: ta.copyfile can only work with files compatible with max file formats. See "max-fileformats.txt" for a list of all possible formats.

method.name: bang
method.description: Copies the source file to the destination.

entry.name: symbol
entry.description:
"copying" : started copying the source file to destination.
"no source found" : if no source file is found or can be read.
"failed" : if ta.copyfile couldn't copy the file.
"done" : when the file has been successfully copied.
